scripts.install: yarn install:app && yarn install:evm && yarn install:chainlink:node && yarn install:chainlink:adapters && yarn install:copyfiles
scripts.install:chainlink:node: git clone https://github.com/smartcontractkit/chainlink .chainlink/node && cd .chainlink/node && git checkout tags/v0.9.4 && make install
scripts.evm:deploy: rm -rf .evm/build/contracts && node pre-deploy && cd .evm && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 3 --network development && cd .. && yarn chainlink:jobs:create && cd .evm && truffle migrate --f 4 --to 6 --network development && cd .. && node post-deploy
